import React, { useState} from 'react' import axios from 'axios' import { Link } from 'react-router-dom' import { useEffect } from 'react' const url = "http://localhost:3006/users" export default (props) => { let [usedata, setStateusedata] = useState([]) let getdata= () => { axios.get(url).then((result) => setStateusedata(result.data)) } useEffect(() => { getdata() }, []) let delateHandler = (id) => { if (window.confirm(`Delated Record Number is${id} ?`)) { axios.delete(`${url}/${id}`) getdata() } } return ( <>

Fetch Reast Api Data using Global url

{ usedata.map((res, index) => { return () }) }
SNO Name EMAIL PHONE Action
{index + 1} {res.name} {res.emial} {res.phone} View Edit
) }
